headline.main: MOVES TO POSTPONE PAN-AMERICAN PARLEY; Brazil It Reported as Acting for Uruguay -- Paraguayan Foreign Minister Visits Argentina.

docs.snippet: THE opening of the new American Embassy at Tokyo added another house to the list of our government-owned ambassadorial residences. A half-dozen years ago there were but fourteen embassies and legations owned by the United States in the fifty-one...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE opening of the new American Embassy at Tokyo added another house to the list of our government-owned ambassadorial residences. A half-dozen years ago there were but fourteen embassies and legations owned by the United States in the fifty-one capitals served by our Ambassadors and Ministers.

headline.main: OUR EMBASSY BUILDINGS NOW A NOTABLE GROUP; New Home for Our Envoy at Tokyo One of a Growing Number of Splendid Residences Recently Acquired

docs.snippet: HAMILTON, Ont., Feb. 27 (AP) -- William Southam, founder and for forty years active head of the publishing and printing companies bearing his name, died here tonight. He was 88 years old.
docs.lead_paragraph: HAMILTON, Ont., Feb. 27 (AP) -- William Southam, founder and for forty years active head of the publishing and printing companies bearing his name, died here tonight. He was 88 years old.

headline.main: WILLIAM SOUTHAM, PUBLISHER, IS DEAD; Was Active Head for 40 Years of Canadian Firm Bearing His Name -- Succumbs at 88. OWNED SIX NEWSPAPERS Chain Extended From Ontario to Vancouver -- Long Active in Hamilton Industries.

docs.snippet: Contract for purchase from Soviet Govt to launch Uruguayan monopoly pending
docs.abstract: Contract for purchase from Soviet Govt to launch Uruguayan monopoly pending

headline.main: PLANS TO BUY SOVIET OIL.; Uruguay Will Sign Contract if Inquiry Clears Trade Agency.

docs.snippet: Withdrawals of gold by France, numerous large changes in earmarked holdings and increased shipments of the metal from Japan featured the shifting of gold supplies here in February.
docs.lead_paragraph: Withdrawals of gold by France, numerous large changes in earmarked holdings and increased shipments of the metal from Japan featured the shifting of gold supplies here in February.

headline.main: GOLD HOLDINGS HERE DECLINE $66,760,400; February Shifting Put Total at 38% of the World's Monetary Supply. JAPAN'S SHIPMENTS RISE Exports of $129,594,500 Are Principally to France -- Amount Held Under Earmark Decreases.

headline.main: 2 CITIES IN BRAZIL REPORTED IN REVOLT; Porto Alegre and Sao Paulo Open Movement -- Federals Massed at Santa Anna. OFFICIALS QUITTING VARGAS President Says He Will Reorganize Government to Suit the People When Assembly Convenes.
